plasticBodies.shadingXml:
<bsdf type="twosided">
    <bsdf type="roughdiffuse">
      <float name="alpha" value="0.7" />
      <texture name="reflectance" type="perlinTexture3D" >
        <rgb name="baseColor" value="#ff6666" />
        <float name="scale" value="1000" />
      </texture>
    </bsdf>
    

</bsdf>
